name: Ghost Dice
description:
A short puzzle horror game made for GMTK game jam 2022. 

Explore a spooky environment while trying to complete your objective. 

Minimum Specs - Not sure, if you try to run it and have trouble leave a comment letting us know the specs of your PC and we will try to help out.

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look Around

F - Interact (open doors, pick up items)

Backspace - Close Map/Journal

M - Open map

Made by LethalBacon and Whatmeow
